text: Mohamed Magdi Hamza Khalif (born 30 August 1996) is an Egyptian athlete specialising in the shot put. He won silver medals at the 2018 African Championships and 2015 African Games. His personal bests are 20.32 metres outdoors (Cairo 2016) and 19.35 metres indoors (Jablonec nad Nisou 2017). ==International competitions== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |rowspan=6|2013
